name: CodeReviewBot
description: An intelligent AI-powered code review bot for C# .NET Core projects
helpMarkDown: This task runs intelligent code analysis on C# files and posts contextual feedback to pull requests.
author: Your Publisher

inputs.name: rulesUrl
inputs.label: Coding Standards URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL to the JSON file containing coding standards and rules

inputs.name: aiEnabled
inputs.label: Enable AI Analysis
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable AI-powered code analysis using OpenAI/Claude APIs

inputs.name: aiApiKey
inputs.label: AI API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API key for OpenAI or Claude (stored as secret)

inputs.name: aiModel
inputs.label: AI Model
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AI model to use for analysis

inputs.name: learningEnabled
inputs.label: Enable Learning & Adaptation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable the bot to learn from team feedback and adapt rules

inputs.name: maxCommentsPerFile
inputs.label: Max Comments Per File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of comments to post per file

inputs.name: enableSummary
inputs.label: Enable Summary Comments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Post a summary comment with overall analysis results

inputs.name: severityThreshold
inputs.label: Minimum Severity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimum severity level for issues to be reported
